Articles.Content:
Is there anywhere in game (or with a mod) to see the list of achievements for a kerbonaut that have given them experience points? Basically, a way to track what each kerbal has done in the table at http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Experience

I want to use it to plan what kerbonaut to send on each mission, and I'd rather have an in-game way to do it rather than a separate spreadsheet.

Edited May 2, 2015 by JAD_Interplanetary
the berbonaut complex gives you a log of what they've done to get experience if you mouse over the kerbal
I believe this is the mod you are looking for. [thread=67246]Link[/thread].

the berbonaut complex gives you a log of what they've done to get experience if you mouse over the kerbal

Thanks for the info. That's what I was looking for. I also learned that you only get the highest XP award for each planet/moon, they don't stack, which I think is a bit weird, but whatever.
